feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Computador(Computador) :o Mesa(Mesa) :o Portatil(Portatil) :g [1,*] : Windows 10(Windows 10) : Fedora(Fedora) : oSX Yosemite(oSX Yosemite) :o Servidor(Servidor) :g [1,*] : Windows Server(Windows Server) : RedHat Linux(RedHat Linux) : OSX server(OSX server) :m Marca(Marca) :g [1,*] : Dell(Dell) : Toshiba(Toshiba) : Lenovo(Lenovo) : Apple(Apple) : Clon(Clon) :m CPU(CPU) :m RAM(RAM) :g [1,*] : 4gb(4gb) : 8gb(8gb) : 16gb(16gb) : 32gb(32gb) : 64gb(64gb) :m Procesador(Procesador) :g [1,*] : Intel(Intel) : Amd(Amd) :m Disco duro(Disco duro) :o 500gb(500gb) :o 1tb(1tb) :o 2tb(2tb) :o 5tb(5tb) :o 10tb(10tb) :o Tarjeta g치fica(Tarjeta g치fica) :g [1,*] : Nvidia(Nvidia) : Ati radeon(Ati radeon) :o Pantalla(Pantalla) :o Tipo(Tipo) :g [1,*] : 3D(3D) : 4K(4K) :o Tama침o(Tama침o) :g [1,*] : 14(14) : 17(17) : 24(24) :o Planta UPS(Planta UPS)
feature_model.constraints: C1:~Portatil or ~Clon C2:~Portatil or Pantalla C3:~Portatil or ~3D C4:~Portatil or ~4K C5:~Portatil or 500gb or 1tb or 2tb C6:~Mesa or 500gb or 1tb or 2tb C7:~Portatil or 4gb or 8gb or 16gb C8:~Mesa or 4gb or 8gb or 16gb C9:~Portatil or ~Windows Server C10:~Portatil or ~RedHat Linux C11:~Portatil or ~OSX server C12:~Mesa or ~Windows Server C13:~Mesa or ~RedHat Linux C14:~Mesa or ~OSX server C15:~Apple or OSX server or oSX Yosemite C16:~Servidor or Windows Server or RedHat Linux or OSX server C17:~Servidor or 32gb or 64gb C18:~Servidor or 5tb or 10tb
